title: REST Countries API with color theme switcher
description: User is able to toggle between light & dark mode.
Users is able to filter view by regions and also search by country names.
Users are able to view countries details and also have access to border countries while on the country details.

title: Untitled Realty
description: Users can add, delete, edit a listing and also mark a listing as sold.
Users get notified when their listings recieve a review, added as favorite by other users.
Users can update their profile informations, and other users can search for a realtor on the site.
Users can add other users listing to their favorites listings, and can leave a review under a listing.

title: Unsplash Clone
description: Users is able to download the photos of their choice right on the home or when they view the photo details in full size.
Users is able to load more photos once they reach the end of the photos automatically or by clicking on the load more button.
Users can view photos details and see other related suggestions of that photoor by the owner of the photo.
Users is able to search for the type of photo they are looking for or fetch the photos by selecting the category.
